name: Pitch Shift
description:
You might experience errors on some browsers, Chrome or something similar should work fine. There's also the downloadable versions. 

Headphones heavily recommended! Have fun! :'D

Made for the GameDevHQ Community Jam #2 in 6 days.

We'd love to hear your thoughts on it!

Check us out!
